Name: sna-abdullahjmadini
Author: Abdullah J. M. Adini And Students

Translations.Text: Zvirokwazvo, takava tinotumira Nowa kuvanhu vake, uye akati: “Imi vanhu vangu! Namatai Allah! Hamuna mumwe mwari kunze kwavo. Zvechokwadi ndinokutyirai mutongo wezuva guru (Qiyaamah)!”
Vatungamiriri vevanhu vake vakati: “Zvirokwazvo, tinoona kuti wakarasika zviri pachena.”
(Nowa) Akati: “Imi vanhu vanhu! Hapana kurasika mandiri, asi ndiri mutumwa kubva kuna Tenzi vepasi rose!”
“Ndirikusvitsa kwamuri mashoko aTenzi vangu, uye ndichikupai yambiro yakanaka. Uye ndinoziva kubva kuna Allah izvo zvamusingazivi.”
“Munoshamiswa here kuti kwauya yeuchidzo kubva kuna Tenzi venyu kuburikidza nemurume pakati penyu, kuti akuyambirei kuti mungave munotya Allah, uye kuti zvimwe mungagamuchire nyasha dzavo?”
Asi vakamuramba, saka takamununura pamwechete neavo vaiva naye mungarava, uye takanyudza (mumvura) avo vakaramba zviratidzo zvedu. Zvirokwazvo, vakanga vari mapofu
